# Agent-Generated Documentation

This folder contains all markdown documentation generated by AI agents during development.

## Naming Convention

All files follow the format: `YYYY-MM-DD-HHmmss-descriptive-name.md`

## Index

| Date | File | Description |
|------|------|-------------|
| 2026-01-26 | 2026-01-26-120000-project-planning.md | Initial project planning and UI feature list |

## Cleanup Policy

- Archive docs older than 6 months to `./archive/`
- Maintain this index with document purposes
